code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{fetchIPOs}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function IPOSelector(_ref){let{onSelectIPO}=_ref;const[ipos,setIPOs]=useState([]);const[selected,setSelected]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{fetchIPOs().then(setIPOs);},[]);const handleChange=e=>{setSelected(e.target.value);const ipo=ipos.find(ipo=>ipo.IPO_Name===e.target.value);onSelectIPO(ipo||null);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{marginBottom:16},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Select IPO:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:selected,onChange:handleChange,style:{marginLeft:8},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",children:"--Choose an IPO--"}),ipos.map(ipo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:ipo.IPO_Name,children:ipo.IPO_Name},ipo.IPO_Name))]})]})});}
